title: 190 - Introducing the Fighting Warm Fuzzies
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with all the boys in studio and Boston Connor is tearing todays full barn. The boys all kick it off discussing their latest tv shows and movies, including a full break DAHN of Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, and the new James Bond. The boys then jump into the POD Fod, which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Today FOD includes the new Spiderman Trailer, an all you can eat travesty, Pete Davidsons and Kim K’s latest, and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
